privacy.title: Introduction
privacy.description: At QueenShopy, we are dedicated to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal information.

privacy.title: Information Collection
privacy.description: We collect personal information such as your name, email address, and payment details when you make a purchase or interact with our site. We also gather non-personal data like browsing behavior to improve your experience.

privacy.title: Use of Information
privacy.description: Your information is used to process orders, provide customer support, and personalize your shopping experience. With your consent, we may also send you promotional materials and updates.

privacy.title: Data Sharing
privacy.description: We do not sell or rent your personal information. We may share your data with trusted third-party partners (e.g., payment processors, shipping companies) solely for the purposes of fulfilling orders and providing services.

privacy.title: Data Security
privacy.description: We implement robust security measures to protect your personal data from unauthorized access or breaches. While we strive to ensure the security of our systems, no method of transmission over the internet is completely secure.

privacy.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies

privacy.title: Contact Information

policy.title: Eligibility
policy.description: You may return items within specified timeframe, 14 days of receipt, provided they are in their original condition with tags attached. Please review the specific eligibility criteria for each product.

policy.title: Return Process
policy.description: To initiate a return, please contact our customer service team at pankajmalankiya1998@gmail.com for instructions. You will need to provide your order number and reason for the return.

policy.title: Refund Process
policy.description: Refunds will be processed to your original payment method once we receive and inspect the returned item. Please allow specified timeframe,5-7 business days for the refund to reflect in your account.

policy.title: Exchanges
policy.description: If you wish to exchange an item, please follow the return process and indicate your desired replacement. Additional shipping charges may apply.

policy.title: Non-Returnable Items
policy.description: Certain items, such as final sale products, personalized items, and swimwear, may not be eligible for return or refund. Please check product descriptions for details.

policy.title: Shipping Costs
policy.description: Return shipping costs are the responsibility of the customer unless the item is defective or incorrect. We recommend using a trackable shipping service for returns.

policy.title: Refund Timing
policy.description: Refunds are processed within specified timeframe, 7 business days after we receive the returned item. Please note that the processing time may vary based on your bank or payment provider.

policy.title: Customer Support
policy.description: For any questions about returns or refunds, please contact our customer support team at pankajmalankiya1998@gmail.com.

policy.title: Exceptions
policy.description: We reserve the right to make exceptions to our return policy on a case-by-case basis. Any exceptions will be communicated to you directly.
